scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:schema && npm run tsc && npm run copy:metadata
scripts.build:package: LOG_LEVEL=info rm -f gluco-tracker@gluco.dev.zip && npm run clean:package && npm run build && cd dist && zip -qr ../gluco-tracker@gluco.dev.zip *
scripts.dev:wayland: LOG_LEVEL=debug npm run build && npm run install:extension && npm run wayland-session
scripts.build:translations: for file in $(ls po/*.po); do mkdir -p resources/locale/$(basename $file .po)/LC_MESSAGES; msgfmt -c $file -o resources/locale/$(basename $file .po)/LC_MESSAGES/gluco-tracker.mo; done
scripts.merge:translations: for file in $(ls po/*.po); do msgmerge -U $file po/main.pot --backup=none; done
